data.name: City Cube 1
data.desc: Sometimes when something looks right, it just is right. That's the principle CUBE has applied to the Ella Ride, whose effortlessly stylish lines disguise a thoroughly thought out bike that's as easy to live with as it is fun to ride.

data.name: City Cube Cruise
data.desc: Form over function? Not at all. The Ella Cruise's sleek styling may be what catches your eye initially, but it won't be long before you'll fall for its pragmatic features, too.
